resources.string: This application helps you to achieve a reading challenge. Choose a number of books to read in a year. Each book must fit into a given theme. Read at least one book from each theme and achieve your goal !
Follow your progression through the number of themes you\'ve chosen.\n\n
Feel free to submit your suggestions of books fitting in the themes and share your progression with yours friends. \n\nAre you ready to read ?
Do you have an idea of a book blending into this theme?

The suggestion will be approved by administrator before publishing.
If you like this app, please rate it.
If you found any errors in the app, please report them to me and the app will be updated whithin the next 24 hours.

ReadBoard is an app helping you to achieve a reading challenge. According to your reading abilities, choose the level that suits the best to you. 

According to the level you've chosen, you will have a given number of books to read in order to achieve your challenge. The higher the level, the more books you will have to read. Each theme include a description and suggestions of books. 

Be careful ! You can't read any book ! The point is to read at least one book from each given themes. It's really easy : you just have to choose a theme to learn more about it ! Lack of ideas ? We propose you suggestions of books fitting in the theme.

The goal is to read a book that fits into each theme of the challenge ! As soon as you finished your book, you can check the associated theme. \n\nYou can find help with various suggestions of books fitting into the theme. Feel free to suggest a new book suggestion to help other users in their challenge !

You can check your progress in order to know the number of themes left to read and the percentage of completion. 

You can share your progress with your friends or a selected theme you just checked ! 

You dreamed too big ? Tou think the challenge is too easy ? It's okay, you can change the level anytime ! The read themes will stay saved. 

By clicking on the suggestions of books, you will be redirected to the Wikipedia page which describes the chosen book. Is it doesn't exist, don't hesitate to create it !

Beginner : 12 themes per year (1 book per month)
Intermediate : 24 themes per year (2 books per month)
Expert : 52 themes per year (1 book per week)
